Articles.Content: i have had trouble with this all day. i cannot recover my vessels after a mission. it lets me click the recover option and gives me funds and science after but my vessel remains there along with my kerbal. this is a continuous loop. included my player log. Any ideas? [url]https://www.dropbox.com/s/5jyhpohgdtkwih1/Player.log?dl=0[/url]

[quote]MissingMethodException: Method not found: 'MessageSystem.AddMessage'.
at KerbalKonstructs.KerbalKonstructs.OnVesselRecovered (.ProtoVessel vessel) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0
at EventData`1[ProtoVessel].Fire (.ProtoVessel data) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0
at VesselRetrieval.recoverVessel (.Vessel v) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0
at VesselRetrieval.recoverVessels () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0
at VesselRetrieval+.MoveNext () [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 [/quote]

The problem is that you are running KerbalKonstructs on 1.0.5. I would normally say put it in the thread, but AlphaAsh is not supporting 1.0.5 as I understand it.
Thanks so much that definitely fixed it. Guess we will have to wait until 1.1 to use KK again
